SEARCH
Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.bean

Class NotificationBean

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.bean.NotificationBean
@ApplicationScoped public class NotificationBean extends Object
The NotificationBean class is responsible for managing NotificationEntity instances. It is an application scoped bean, meaning there is a single instance for the entire application.

  • Constructor Details

    • NotificationBean

      public NotificationBean()

  • Method Details

    • createDefaultNotificationsIfNotExistent

      public void createDefaultNotificationsIfNotExistent()
      Creates default notifications for demonstration or initial setup purposes. This method checks if there are any notifications present in the database and, if not, creates a predefined set of notifications for a project.

    • getUserNotifications

      public List<NotificationDto> getUserNotifications(int userId, int page)
      Retrieves notifications for a user, combining unread and read notifications up to a limit. This method prioritizes unread notifications and fills the remaining slots with the most recent read notifications.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose notifications are being retrieved.
      page - The pagination page number for read notifications.
      Returns:
      A list of NotificationDto representing the user's notifications.

    • getTotalUserNotifications

      public int getTotalUserNotifications(int userId)
      Counts the total number of notifications for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The total count of notifications for the specified user.

    • getUnreadNotificationCount

      public int getUnreadNotificationCount(int userId)
      Counts the number of unread notifications for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The count of unread notifications for the specified user.

    • createProjectNotification

      public void createProjectNotification(String projectSystemName, StateProjectENUM projectStatus, String userName, UserEntity receptor, String systemUserName)
      Creates and sends a project-related notification to a user. This method is used for notifications related to project events such as creation, updates, and status changes.
      Parameters:
      projectSystemName - The system name of the project.
      projectStatus - The current status of the project.
      userName - The name of the user associated with the event.
      receptor - The user entity who will receive the notification.
      systemUserName - The system username of the user associated with the event.

    • createRejectProjectNotification

      public void createRejectProjectNotification(String projectSystemName, StateProjectENUM projectStatus, String userName, UserEntity receptor, String systemUserName)
      Creates and sends a project rejection-related notification to a user.
      Parameters:

      projectStatus - The current status of the project.
      userName - The name of the user associated with the event.
      receptor - The user entity who will receive the notification.
      systemUserName - The system username of the user associated with the event.

    • getSystemUsernameOfCreatorOfNotificationByReceptorAndType

      public String getSystemUsernameOfCreatorOfNotificationByReceptorAndType(int receptorId, NotificationTypeENUM type)
      Retrieves the system username of the creator of a notification by the receptor ID and notification type.
      Parameters:
      receptorId - The ID of the receptor.
      type - The type of the notification.
      Returns:
      The system username of the creator of the notification.

    • markMessageNotificationClicked

      public void markMessageNotificationClicked(int userId, List<Integer> notificationIds)
      Marks message notifications as clicked.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      notificationIds - The list of notification IDs to be marked as clicked.

    • markAllNotificationsClicked

      public void markAllNotificationsClicked(int userId, String projectSystemName)
      Marks all notifications as clicked for a user and project.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      projectSystemName - The system name of the project.
